summary: Simple mod that makes Shahvee nude all the time.
descriptionHtml:
~~~READ ME~~~

I perfer my spouse(s) to be nude at all times (like the Ferengi from Startrek) without any work of adjusting equipment every time the game loads.

Works with all nude mods, NPC body mods, skeletal structure mods or what armor/clothes she has or equiped. If she is just going to stay in the house all day and cook, walk around, then she will at least be catching to the eye doing so. :]

*****Nude mod currently displayed to make her nude is not mine, this is just an example. Your nude mod can have nipples or not.

Screenshots taken at 1800x1440 in the Argonian Assemblage.

Compatible with or without Dawnguard DLC.

Works ONLY with Shahvee, more NPCs with options are possible in the future.

No conflicts with any mods I have so far, please let me know if so.

Made with Creation Kit.

Enjoy!

==
Change Log:
V 1.0 - Initial release

==
Install/Uninstall:
Use Nexus Mod Manager
-or-
Place the \"Shahveev2.esp\" into your install Data folder, to manually remove just move or delete the file.
author: imegabyte
